message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects our positions in the game.
Let's split it equally, Alice. It's the fairest way, and we both get a good amount.
Bob, time is money, and money is losing value. I'll concede a bit more than last time, but this is my final offer.
Alice, I think we're getting close. Considering the rapidly decreasing value of the money, I'm willing to take a slightly larger share to end the game quickly. Let's settle on this offer.
